document_data.caption: A map showing the Throat on the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Throat
document_data.mainbody: The '''Throat''' was the name given to a small bay found in northern [[Var]] in the [[Shining Lands]].
document_data.Geography: The Throat sat in the northwest corner of Var. It offered natural shelter for several notable towns, including Var's capital city [[Pyratar]]. It was roughly enclosed by the islands of [[Vathal]] and [[Mordyr]].
